articles.title: COVID-hit Rolls-Royce picks ex-Deloitte partner Kakoullis as finance chief - Sky News
articles.description: Panos Kakoullis's appointment as the company's finance chief will be announced early this week, Sky News learns.

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: UK downplays risk of EU poaching City of London business - Reuters
articles.description: Britain on Sunday downplayed the risk of the European Union taking business away from the City of London after Brexit, saying the real challenges come from New York, Tokyo and other areas.

articles.author: Oli Smith
articles.title: 'Real risk we are ignoring!' Boris told to add 20 new Covid symptoms – leading scientist - Express
articles.description: A LEADING coronavirus expert has urged the Government to immediately expand the number of symptoms beyond the 'classic three symptoms' to a range of twenty as he voiced concern that there is a 'real risk that we are ignoring'.
